recipe.title: Wine Spritzer
ingredients: 3 ounces aromatic white wine (such as Sauvignon Blanc, Riesling, or Gewürztraminer)
instructions: Pour wine into a wineglass filled with ice; top off with club soda and a dash of bitters. Garnish with orange twist.
